overview: Ravishing red-haired Lottie is off on the adventure of a lifetime, backpacking through Ibiza with just a yoga mat, some cute clothes, and an open mind. This college graduate doesn’t have a destination in mind, only a desire to meet some interesting people and have some new experiences. Maybe she’ll get lucky and meet a local who can show her something she’ll always remember when she gets back home.
title: Lottie
